definition: deciduous shrub of eastern North America having tough flexible branches and pliable bark and small yellow flowers
details:
noun
- deciduous shrub of eastern North America having tough flexible branches and pliable bark and small yellow flowers
= synonyms: moosewood, moose-wood, wicopy, ropebark
- shrub or small tree of southeastern United States to West Indies and Brazil
= synonyms: cyrilla, white titi
